feed.title: torrra Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for torrra: v1.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: expose jackett provider flags by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/46
  • feat: make --jackett accept optional url and api key by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/47

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6

entry.title: New release for torrra: v1.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump libtorrent-windows-dll from 0.0.2 to 0.0.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/51
  • chore(deps): bump certifi from 2025.6.15 to 2025.7.14 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/52
  • fix: resolve prowlarr magnet uri if redirect by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/59

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

entry.title: New release for torrra: v1.1.2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

entry.title: New release for torrra: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump libtorrent-windows-dll from 0.0.2 to 0.0.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/64
  • chore(deps): bump certifi from 2025.6.15 to 2025.7.14 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/65
  • chore(deps): bump astral-sh/setup-uv from 5 to 6 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/63
  • fix: integrate click and lazy load heavy modules by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/67
  • refactor: proper types by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/68
  • feat: docker compose with jackett server by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/70
  • refactor: validate indexers before run by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/72
  • feat: --no-cache cmd flag by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/73

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/compare/v1.1.2...v1.2.0
